players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out what could have happened."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob, let's keep a close eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety. It is important that we work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death."
You: "I will remain silent and observe everyone's actions. I believe the detective might be Charlie, as he agreed with Bob's suggestion to keep an eye on each other."
